SQL.LOAD: SELECT payment_group_number, payment_group_status_id, payment_group_date, payment_group_total, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by, payment_group_id FROM elp_payment_group WHERE payment_group_id = :payment_group_id
SQL.LOAD_PAYMENT_GROUP: SELECT pymntGrp.payment_group_id, pymntGrp.payment_group_number, pymntGrp.payment_group_status_id payment_group_status, pymntGrp.payment_group_date, pymntGrp.payment_group_total FROM elp_payment_group pymntGrp where 1 = 1 and rownum <= :row_num --dynamic_inner_where_clause --dynamic_outer_where_clause
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_payment_group SET payment_group_number = :payment_group_number, payment_group_status_id = :payment_group_status_id, payment_group_date = :payment_group_date, payment_group_total = :payment_group_total, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE payment_group_id = :payment_group_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_payment_group ( payment_group_number, payment_group_status_id, payment_group_date, payment_group_total, created_by, payment_group_id ) VALUES ( :payment_group_number, :payment_group_status_id, :payment_group_date, :payment_group_total, :created_by, :payment_group_id )
